title: Why i should not get a ban for sitting at base
body:
The player "*~~nameremoved~~*" locked in mid after i called and locked in. Then he went mid and tried to take the first wave then decided to go back bot and feed the adc. Then he continuously fed mid. So i asked in all chat for them to end. but instead that makes them just play super passive and accept the free kills from akali. 
WHY SHOULD I HAVE TO PLAY FOR 20 MINUITS??
There should be a built in system where you can have a team vote to end the to surrender pre 20. Obviously this would get abused by some flamers but this would stop the situations like this where Im probably going to get a que ban for not playing this BULLSH1T 
currently 15 mins in and she is 0-13 with 3 boots

replies.body: It sucks when someone takes your role and then proceeds to troll but that doesn't mean you can't try to have fun anyway. Hit a minion, buy a Zz'Rot or maybe try outplay them under your tower. If you're stuck there you might as well make the most of it.
When life deals you lemons, make lemonade.
Name shaming is not allowed, please remove the name thank u.

I dont mind if i get banned from the boards as long as i get my word out. I love this game and have played for ages but when you have to sit through that for 20 mins just because someone is having a tantrum it just ruins it.
I love tantrums on the boards.
Bro the threads just going to be taken down. If you want to get your word out, remove the name.
